speaker: agent
dialogue: If he’s got a case there’s only one place that Theodore goes after work, a cafe in downtown called Purple. I see him in the window, looking over a folder. I steel myself for this conversation, Theodore was my old partner, I’m sure he’ll understand.

speaker: agent
dialogue: I entered the cafe and walked past the waitress and right up to Teddy, “Teddy, I need help with a case.”

speaker: agent
dialogue: I need you to drop the case with the Mothfia.

speaker: agent
dialogue: My eyes fight back tears, “Teddy I…”

speaker: teddy
dialogue: Theadore looks up at me, he must have seen the panic in my eyes, “Oh, of course, please sit down.”

speaker: teddy
dialogue: What’s wrong? It must be important because you’ve not spoken to me since you left the force.

speaker: teddy
dialogue: Ah don’t worry I’m just giving you a hard time, but I won’t lie, I did miss having some conversation to go with my coffee.

speaker: teddy
dialogue: Teddy stopped smiling and looked at me, I could see him running the numbers in his head. I see him thinking about all the times I’ve let him down, about all the favors I’ve asked him to do, about abandoning him. “Is this about Sheila?”

speaker: teddy
dialogue: He sighs, “Consider it done, but I’m going to want you to order a coffee and sit with me for a bit.”

speaker: teddy
dialogue: Don’t worry about it, I’m just glad to see you again old friend.
